targets.rawSql: select distinct count(w.*),now() as "time" from workers w where EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM now()-w.last_seen) < 600
select distinct  count(*),now() as "time" from job_status where status in ('queued') and notification_type='Job'
SELECT  count(notification_type)FROM job_status WHERE  notification_type in ('FFMPEG','Download','Upload')  and $__timeFilter("event_time")
SELECT  count(notification_type) FROM job_status WHERE notification_type in ('FFMPEG')  and $__timeFilter("event_time")
SELECT  count(notification_type) FROM job_status WHERE notification_type in ('Download') and $__timeFilter("event_time")
SELECT  count(notification_type) FROM job_status WHERE notification_type in ('Upload') and $__timeFilter("event_time")
SELECT  count(notification_type)FROM job_status WHERE notification_type in ('Job') and status='completed' and $__timeFilter("event_time")
SELECT count(notification_type)FROM job_status WHERE notification_type in ('Job') and status='failed'  and $__timeFilter("event_time")

SELECT
  SUM((j.source_size - j.target_size) / 1073741824.0) AS total_space_difference_GB
FROM
  jobs j
JOIN
  job_status js ON j.id = js.job_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(js.event_time)  -- Usamos 'event_time' de 'job_status' para el filtro de tiempo
  AND j.source_size > 0  -- Filtramos donde 'source_size' es mayor que 0
  AND j.target_size > 0  -- Filtramos donde 'target_size' es mayor que 0

SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT je1.video_path) AS "Total Files in This State"
FROM
  job_status je1
JOIN
  jobs j ON je1.job_id = j.id  -- Unimos job_status con jobs para acceder a source_size y target_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(je1.event_time)  -- Aplicamos el filtro de tiempo de Grafana
  AND je1.notification_type IN ('Job')  -- Filtramos los trabajos
  AND je1.status = 'completed'  -- Solo trabajos completados
  AND j.source_size > 0  -- Filtramos los trabajos con source_size mayor a 0
  AND j.target_size = 0;  -- Filtramos los trabajos con target_size igual a 0

WITH fecha_completa AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        (SELECT min(DATE(event_time)) FROM job_status WHERE status = 'completed' AND notification_type = 'Job' AND $__timeFilter(event_time)),
        (SELECT max(DATE(event_time)) FROM job_status WHERE status = 'completed' AND notification_type = 'Job' AND $__timeFilter(event_time)),
        '1 day'::interval
    )::date AS fecha
)
SELECT 
    f.fecha,
    COALESCE(COUNT(js.event_time), 0) AS num_jobs_completados
FROM 
    fecha_completa f
LEFT JOIN 
    job_status js
ON 
    DATE(js.event_time) = f.fecha
    AND js.status = 'completed'
    AND js.notification_type = 'Job'
    AND $__timeFilter(js.event_time)
GROUP BY 
    f.fecha
ORDER BY 
    f.fecha;

WITH fecha_completa AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        (SELECT min(DATE(event_time)) FROM job_status WHERE status = 'failed' AND notification_type = 'Job' AND $__timeFilter(event_time)),
        (SELECT max(DATE(event_time)) FROM job_status WHERE status = 'failed' AND notification_type = 'Job' AND $__timeFilter(event_time)),
        '1 day'::interval
    )::date AS fecha
)
SELECT 
    f.fecha,
    COALESCE(COUNT(js.event_time), 0) AS num_jobs_fallados
FROM 
    fecha_completa f
LEFT JOIN 
    job_status js
ON 
    DATE(js.event_time) = f.fecha
    AND js.status = 'failed'
    AND js.notification_type = 'Job'
    AND $__timeFilter(js.event_time)
GROUP BY 
    f.fecha
ORDER BY 
    f.fecha;
select worker_name, count(worker_name) as encoded from job_status where  status in ('completed') and  notification_type='Job' and $__timeFilter(event_time) group by worker_name order by encoded desc
select worker_name, count(worker_name) as encoded from job_status where  status in ('failed') and  notification_type='Job' and $__timeFilter(event_time) group by worker_name order by encoded desc

select distinct regexp_replace(ve1.video_path, '^.+/', '') as "File", ve1.worker_name as "Worker", event_time,  ve1.notification_type as "Action", ve1.job_id as "job_id",  CASE WHEN ve1.message ~ 'progress' THEN (regexp_replace(substring(ve1.message,0,50), '^{\"progress\":\"?([0-9]*\\.?[0-9]*)\"?.*$', '\\1')) WHEN ve1.notification_type = 'Upload' THEN '99.999'  ELSE '0.0' END as progress from job_status ve1 where $__timeFilter(event_time) and notification_type in ('FFMPEG', 'Download', 'Upload', 'PGS')
SELECT count(worker_name) as completed, $__timeGroup(event_time, '10m') as time FROM job_status where notification_type='Job' and status='completed' GROUP BY $__timeGroup(event_time, '10m')

SELECT 
    worker_name, 
    COUNT(worker_name) AS encoded 
FROM 
    job_status 
WHERE 
    status IN ('failed') 
    AND notification_type = 'Job' 
    AND message LIKE '%source file size%' 
    AND $__timeFilter(event_time) 
GROUP BY 
    worker_name 
ORDER BY 
    encoded DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT
  regexp_replace(je1.video_path, '^.+/', '') AS "File",  -- Extraemos el nombre del archivo
  je1.worker_name AS "Worker",  -- Nombre del trabajador
  je1.job_id AS "job_id",  -- ID del trabajo
  je1.event_time AS "Completed",  -- Fecha de finalización del trabajo
  (j.source_size / 1073741824.0) AS "Source Size (GB)",  -- Convertimos source_size a GB
  (j.target_size / 1073741824.0) AS "Target Size (GB)",  -- Convertimos target_size a GB
  ((j.source_size - j.target_size) / 1073741824.0) AS "Size Difference (GB)"  -- Calculamos la diferencia en GB
FROM
  job_status je1
JOIN
  jobs j ON je1.job_id = j.id  -- Unimos job_status con jobs para acceder a source_size y target_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(je1.event_time)  -- Aplicamos el filtro de tiempo de Grafana
  AND je1.notification_type IN ('Job')  -- Filtramos los trabajos
  AND je1.status = 'completed';  -- Solo trabajos completados

SELECT DISTINCT
  regexp_replace(je1.video_path, '^.+/', '') AS "File",  -- Extraemos el nombre del archivo
  je1.worker_name AS "Worker",  -- Nombre del trabajador
  je1.job_id AS "job_id",  -- ID del trabajo
  je1.event_time AS "Completed",  -- Fecha de finalización del trabajo
  (j.source_size / 1073741824.0) AS "Source Size (GB)",  -- Convertimos source_size a GB
  (j.target_size / 1073741824.0) AS "Target Size (GB)",  -- Convertimos target_size a GB
  ((j.source_size - j.target_size) / 1073741824.0) AS "Size Difference (GB)"  -- Calculamos la diferencia en GB
FROM
  job_status je1
JOIN
  jobs j ON je1.job_id = j.id  -- Unimos job_status con jobs para acceder a source_size y target_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(je1.event_time)  -- Aplicamos el filtro de tiempo de Grafana
  AND je1.notification_type IN ('Job')  -- Filtramos los trabajos
  AND je1.status = 'completed'  -- Solo trabajos completados
  AND j.source_size > 0  -- Filtramos los trabajos con source_size mayor a 0
  AND j.target_size = 0;  -- Filtramos los trabajos con target_size igual a 0
select event_time as "Cargado",regexp_replace(video_path, '^.+/', '') as "Video",job_id as "Job" from job_status where status in ('queued') and notification_type='Job' ORDER BY event_time ASC

select regexp_replace(video_path, '^.+/', '') as "Video",event_time as "Fecha fallo", worker_name as "Worker", message as "Mensaje de error" from job_status where status in ('failed') and notification_type='Job' and $__timeFilter("event_time") ORDER BY event_time DESC

select regexp_replace(video_path, '^.+/', '') as "Video",event_time as "Fecha fallo", worker_name as "Worker", message as "Mensaje de error", status as "Estado" from job_status where notification_type='Job' and $__timeFilter("event_time") ORDER BY event_time DESC
